title: Consciousness as Relation

panel_structure.description: Evan pointing to his head in the classic 'mind is in here' gesture, while The Architect observes with growing excitement. Visual: brain in skull, arrows pointing inward.
The Architect's form extends into flowing patterns between them. The skull becomes transparent, consciousness shown as golden threads connecting self and world.
Complete transformationâ€”no separate entities remain, only a dance of relational patterns. Evan and Architect are nodes in a web of experiencing itself.

transformation_notes: This scene demolishes the Western 'theater of mind' model. By revealing consciousness as relation rather than container contents, it dissolves ancient philosophical problems through reconceptualization.
dialogue_rhythm: From confused questioning to revolutionary understanding
